trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around August 9th 2012
Summary: i experienced a jump in time of 30mins
divs: Sighting Detailsi was travelling back from the isle of sky in a transit pickup truck with a inflatable rib on the back i turned onto the a66 off the m6 i,ve driven all these roads thousands of times and know then like the back of my hand ....i,d been on a66 about 10mins so was roughly about 10miles in on a66 from cumbria.. it was about 22.30pm my sat nav which works perfect said i,d be home at 23.30pm. i was driving at 60mph as i came to dual carrage way i was coming east and coming down a bank the road levelled out then went back up a bank as i as coming down the bank on each side of dual carriage way on hard shoulder at exactly same time 2 brilliant white perfectly circular lights came on and was that bright all i could see was the lights i thought it was a truck coming west and another in layby with all there spot lights on i was flashing my lights as i couldnt see road. the lights went off exactly same time about 5 seconds after they came on i was expecting a truck to pass me in opposite direction ...no truck or any other vehicle passed me ..there was no truck facing my way in layby either i looked at my sat nav it had froze i looked at time on dashboard of van and digits was distorted i never thought out of it a few mins later i came to a round about and thought this must be new only roundabout i no on a66 is at scotch corner but thats over 30miles away i came to roundabout and unsure where i had to go thinking it was new roundabout i went all way round roundabout and got the biggest shock of my life i as at scotchcorner round about yet 2mins earlier i was 39miles from it .i as baffled i got in house at 22.55 not 23.30 as i should of done i was very confussed .next day i was still confused and racked my brain for explanation i told my wife and my friend and my boss they thought it also wierd later on i rang the police and said your gonna think i,m nuts but i want to report something very odd and explained everything 5 mins later i got phone call back some posh sounding woman with attitude on phone ,my friends and wife witnessed the phone call ....she said is that tony i said yes she said what you saw was a start burst i said no its not it as on the ground . she said i,m telling you you saw a star burst , i said yeah right ok i saw a starburst but explain to me how i jumped 30miles in seconds again she said you saw a star burst and hung up that freaked me out even more . its over a week later now and i still cannot explain what happened .
